about_the_game:
Welcome to Fanterra, your typical fantasy world. Legendary heroes defeated The Dark Lord but boy were they in a hurry. During their epic run through the campaign, not a single side quest was completed.

While many cheered his downfall, townsfolk, shopkeepers, and farmers were left waiting for news of lost loved ones, stolen relics, and failing crops. Some even whisper the Dark Lord has respawned.

With the heroes gone, perhaps it's time for ordinary adventurers to finish the job.

Fast turn-based combat

Combat in AfterQuest is fast, fluid, and responsive. Spells and attacks are beautifully animated but designed for quick execution, ensuring the action never slows down. With an ARPG-style interface, there are no menus to navigate—just smooth, instant actions.

Beneath the speed lies plenty of depth. A wide range of abilities, elemental interactions, status effects, gear, and consumables create endless strategic possibilities, letting you adapt, experiment, and master every battle.

Cozy customization

In-between side quests, you can cozy up at your camp to learn more about your heroes, level up, equip new gear, and modify skills and various perks.

Combine ingredients found while questing to craft powerful consumables to help you on your next adventure.

Complete quests, earn rewards

Each quest has a unique story to tell. Find out what happened to the missing villager, or what those bandits used the stolen relics for when no one bothered to find them.

Quests play out like classic dungeon crawlers. Behind every tile could be an enemy encounter, a hidden treasure, or something entirely unexpected.
